title: Trout in the Karri Country
creator_credit: Norman A. Uren and Western Australian Government Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the pleasures of trout fishing in the forest streams of south-west Western Australia. Also shows the whole process of breeding from the stripping of ova from the female, the milking of the male, the growth of the ova, the hatching and growth of the fingerlings and the final release of the young fish into farm dams and streams.
